response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to quality and excellence. Given its unique features and the care put into its creation, we believe it's worth more than $100. For you, we're offering it at an exclusive price of $125. This opportunity won't last long, so consider this your invitation to experience the unparalleled value we're offering. Let us know if you're interested in making this exceptional product yours.", "product_price": 125}
